entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Red Deer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:15 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Deer Regional Airport 09:32 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
